forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. High 11C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this morning, becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. High 51F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 4C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 39F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Thunder possible. High 8C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Thunder possible. High 46F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 2C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low near 35F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 6C. ESE winds shifting to SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 42F. ESE winds shifting to SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain...mixing with snow late. Low 1C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain with some snow mixing in late. Low 34F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 100%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 7C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High near 45F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. Low 2C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and snow. Low near 35F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 90%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 7C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High near 45F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 2C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low around 35F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. High near 10C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High near 50F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 33F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 12C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 54F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 14C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. High 57F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 37F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 13C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
